job_tasks.phrase: in een omgeving die niet te groot en niet te klein is

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on Java development for custom portlets and integrations, with an emphasis on learning and development. There is no mention of AI, generative models, machine learning, or related technologies, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
